mapper.insert: insert into work_log (work_id, work_content, start_date, end_date, project_id, user_id, status, work_summary, year, month, week) values (#{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update work_log set work_content = #{workContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_summary = #{workSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, week = #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select work_id, work_content, start_date, end_date, project_id, user_id, status, work_summary, year, month, week from work_log where work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
